++ range
+++ SUMMARY
Create a sequence of numbers from n to p
If n unspecified, starts at 0.

  range(n,p)
  

+++ EXAMPLE

# create sequence of integers 0,1,2,3,4,5
x = range(6)

#print them
for n in x:
  print(n)
  
+++ EXAMPLE
# create sequence of integers 0,1,2,3,4,5
x = range(3, 6)

#print them
for n in x:
  print(n)
